doc.title: GTA 5 - Gta online
doc.author: Anupam
doc.body:
The trolls are at it again.

It's funny how an awesome quality game in single player can turn into the most excrutiating, painful experience when it hits the shelves online
doc.references: <link> <name>5 Things Critics Love About 'GTA V' (That Actually Suck)</name> <url>http://www.cracked.com/blog/5-things-critics-love-about-gta-v-that-actually-suck/</url> </link>
